H0.text: Which country was formerly known by the Greeks as Tylos. Cyprus

H1.text: Which country was formerly known by the Greeks as Tylos. Malta

H2.text: Which country was formerly known by the Greeks as Tylos. Sicily

H3.text: Which country was formerly known by the Greeks as Tylos. Bahrein

A4.text: The island is mentioned at the Acts of the Apostles as Melitene (Ancient Greek: Μελιτήνη).
